name: PowerfulPoptart-Level1
description:
This file is a webgl folder exported from Unity3D

This is the prototype of our game Powerful Poptart's 1st and half of the 2nd level.

Control:

left - A/left arrow

right-D/right arrow

jump-W/up arrow

Special Ability: Dash (an impulse adds to the player and have 3 seconds of cool own time until you can use it again) - direction key + Shift (ex, if you want to add an impulse when you run to the left then press "left arrow + Shift" or "A + Shift")

Main Plot:

Our main protagonist, genetically modified hamster Poptart tries to save his abducted human family from the evil and vindictive hamster boss.
